data.title: Shivaji Ganesan Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Shivaji Ganesan with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

In his almost 50 year career he appeared in close to 300 films

Starred in Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Malayalam and Hindi language films

Became the first Indian actor to receive a Best Actor award at an international film festival (at the Afro-Asian Film Festival in Cairo, 1960)

Awarded the Padma Bhushan, India's third highest civilian award, in 1984

Received the Special Jury Award for Thevar Magan (1992) at the National Film Awards

Was conferred the Dabasaheb Phalke Award for his contribution to Indian cinema in 1997

A statue of him has been erected in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, in 2006
